step.name: Locate the Sync button
step.text: Find the Sync button under either the Collections tab or the Tags tab

step.name: Click the Sync button
step.text: Click the Sync button to sync new tags and collections

step.name: Wait for completion
step.text: Wait for the sync process to complete, which may take a few minutes depending on store size

mainEntity.name: What should you do when you can't find the tag or collection you want using the search function?

acceptedAnswer.text: Use the Sync button to sync new tags and collections to the app
